meta.job_title: Digital Experience (DX) Customer Success Global Project Manager

duties_responsibilities.duty: Simultaneously manage 3-4 independent projects from planning to implementation, ensuring alignment with organizational objectives.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to develop strategic plans, goals, and objectives for projects, aligned with organizational objectives.
Engage with internal partners globally to foster effective communication, alignment, and collaboration.
Produce accurate and timely reporting of project status throughout its life cycle, including business trend analysis and dashboard reporting.
Identify potential risks, develop mitigation strategies, and proactively address issues that may impact project timelines, results, or quality.
Drive continuous improvement initiatives using lessons learned and industry advancements.
Lead project communication, issue identification/escalation, and status updates.
Assist in implementing IT/software project implementations.
Use Workforce Management Platforms and Project Management Tools effectively.
Explain complex projects and processes concisely and simply.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree or higher (Computer Science, Engineering, Systems Analysis, Information Technology, or related field is a plus)
